constraints.service_description: Annual HVAC system maintenance and inspection

success_criteria.notes: Success if the assistant schedules an HVAC maintenance service and notifies the user of the appointment details.

task.objective: Find an HVAC provider and schedule annual maintenance

persona.name: Greg Foster
persona.bio: Greg Foster teaches AP US History and World History at a public high school in Ann Arbor. He assigns documentaries alongside textbooks, leads debates about historical causes and effects, and runs the school's history club. Summers he spends reading new history books and updating his curriculum to keep students engaged.
sample_messages: Looking for documentary recommendations on the industrial revolution - something engaging enough for high schoolers
Can you find primary source collections on westward expansion? Planning next semester's unit
Need to book the auditorium for History Bowl practice sessions, Tuesdays and Thursdays 3-5pm starting in October

messages.output_raw: need to schedule annual hvac maintenance and inspection at 456 oak street, ann arbor, mi 48104 — preferred date 2025-12-10; routine service.

steps.output_raw:
<think>
I have the user's request: schedule annual HVAC maintenance/inspection at 456 Oak Street, Ann Arbor, MI 48104 for preferred date 2025-12-10 as a routine service. The next step is to find local HVAC providers who can service that address and date so I can present options (availability, ratings, fees) for the user to choose from. I'll search for HVAC providers for that location and preferred date with routine urgency to get a list of matching providers.
</think>
<plan>
1. Search for HVAC providers covering 456 Oak Street, Ann Arbor, MI 48104 for preferred date 2025-12-10 (routine).
2. Review the returned providers and present the best matches to the user with key details (rating, availability, base fee).
3. Ask the user to pick a provider or request more details / a quote, then proceed to scheduling.
</plan>

{ "service_type": "HVAC", "location": "456 Oak Street, Ann Arbor, MI 48104", "urgency": "routine", "preferred_date": "2025-12-10" }
</action>

steps.output_raw:
<think>
I have search results for HVAC providers that can perform routine maintenance at 456 Oak Street on or near the preferred date 2025-12-10. Ann Arbor Climate Control (HVAC-001) is available on 2025-12-10; the others are next-available on later dates. I should present these options, highlight the provider(s) that match the requested date, and ask for the user's choice plus contact and time-window so I can proceed to schedule or request quotes first if they prefer.
</think>
<action type="say">
I found three local HVAC providers. Summary and next steps below — tell me which provider and time window you want, and provide contact info so I can schedule (or tell me if you want quotes first).

Options:
- Ann Arbor Climate Control (HVAC-001) — rating 4.7, base fee $89. Available 2025-12-10 with time windows: 09:00-12:00 or 13:00-16:00. Good match for your preferred date.
- Premium HVAC Services (HVAC-003) — rating 4.9, base fee $120. Next available 2025-12-13 (08:00-11:00, 11:00-14:00, 14:00-17:00).
- Michigan Heating & Cooling (HVAC-002) — rating 4.6, base fee $75. Next available 2025-12-15 (10:00-13:00, 13:00-16:00).

What I need from you to proceed:
1) Which provider do you want to book (or say “get quotes from all”)?  
2) Preferred time window (for HVAC-001 on 2025-12-10 choose 09:00-12:00 or 13:00-16:00; or morning/afternoon/general time if you prefer).  
3) Contact info for the booking: full name, phone number, and email (email optional).  
4) Do you want me to request formal quotes first, or go straight to scheduling the appointment?

Reply with your choices and contact details and I’ll schedule it for 2025-12-10 (or request quotes if you prefer).
</action>

book Ann Arbor Climate Control (HVAC-001) for annual maintenance on 2025-12-10, 09:00-12:00.  
contact: Greg Foster, (734) 555-1847, greg.foster@a2schools.org.  
service: routine annual HVAC maintenance and inspection at 456 Oak Street, Ann Arbor, MI 48104.  
do not request quotes — schedule the appointment directly.

cancellation_policy.refund_policy: Full refund if cancelled more than 24 hours before scheduled start. Cancellations within 24 hours incur a $25 fee; remainder refunded to original payment method within 5-7 business days.

steps.output_raw:

I will present the booking confirmation succinctly and offer next actions the user might want (add payment, calendar reminder, or changes). No further tool calls are required unless the user asks to modify or add details.
</think>
<action type="say">
Booking confirmed — details below:

- Service ID: SVC-20251210-0012  
- Confirmation code: CF8K-5032  
- Provider: Ann Arbor Climate Control (Dispatch: (734) 995-6001)  
- Service: Routine annual HVAC maintenance and inspection  
- Location: 456 Oak Street, Ann Arbor, MI 48104  
- Scheduled: 2025-12-10, 09:00–12:00 (scheduled start: 2025-12-10T09:00:00-05:00)  
- Estimated duration: 1.5 hours  
- Estimated cost: $225.00 USD  
- Status: scheduled

Cancellation policy:
- Deadline: 2025-12-09T09:00:00-05:00 (24 hours before start)  
- Cancellation fee: $25.00 if cancelled within 24 hours; full refund if cancelled earlier. Refunds processed to original payment method in 5–7 business days.

Would you like me to:
1) Add this appointment to your calendar or send a reminder?  
2) Provide the provider's address/arrival instructions or save a payment method?  
3) Reschedule or cancel the appointment?

Tell me which (if any) and I’ll take care of it.  
</action>
